pushNotificationsDescription: Receive instant notifications in your browser
permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please enable notifications in your browser settings.
useModernBrowser: Your browser doesn't support push notifications. Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.
errorLoadingSettings: Error loading notification settings. Please try again later.
subscriptionFailed: Failed to subscribe to push notifications.
unsubscribeInfo: To disable push notifications, please update your browser settings.
testNotificationBody: This is a test notification from our service.
testNotificationDescription: Click the button below to send a test notification to your device. This will help verify that push notifications are working correctly.
testBody: This is a test notification from our service.
pushEnabledDesc: You will now receive push notifications from our service.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.profileDescription: Update your personal information and preferences.
settings.testNotificationDescription: Test and verify your push notification setup.
settings.securityDescription: Update your password and security settings.
settings.billingDescription: Manage your payment methods and billing information.
